function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Zoonotic disease outbreaks including COVID-19","Impact":"Potential for widespread illness, economic disruption, and loss of life","Mitigation":"Enhanced surveillance, public health measures, and vaccine development","Technologies":"Public health monitoring systems, vaccine production technology","People":"General public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Large-scale engineering projects","Impact":"Disruption of local ecosystems, potential for environmental contamination","Mitigation":"Environmental impact assessments, sustainable engineering practices","Technologies":"Remote sensing technology, sustainable engineering materials","People":"Local communities, wildlife and ecosystems","Owner":"Engineering companies, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Sudden economic or political change","Impact":"Instability, social unrest, economic downturn","Mitigation":"Economic diversification, social welfare programs, political stability measures","Technologies":"Economic forecasting models, social welfare technology","People":"Population at large, marginalized communities, businesses","Owner":"Government, policy makers"}]}
